body:
I think I see the same issue on Windows too, though the error and stack seem different. In both cases it happens from the browser process:

 EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION_READ

Hm, maybe I am wrong and this crash is actually the other one that happens when closing dev tools, at least the stack looks like it.
But I do see a crash right on opening of VS Code on Windows too, so it is not platform specific.
Have not seen this so far using Electron 0.37.5.
